1: <pb/><e>Tna'j Dios David</e> <pb/><t>Nman Dios, chin tb'intza ex chin ttzaq'wentza porke b'isxix atine ex meb'a qine;</t>
2: <t>chin tkloma porke in chin nimane teya. Aya Ndiose chin tkloma, aqine tmajena q'uql nk'u'je ti'ja.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Nman, q'aq'antz tk'u'ja wi'je, tkyaqil or in jaw tq'ajq'ajel nwi'ye ti'ja.</t>
4: <t>Nman, tzalajsama nk'u'je aqine tmajena, porke twitza in chin kub'sane.</t>
5: <t>Porke b'a'na Nman ex in kub' tnajsa'na kyil xjal; nimxix tk'ujlalila kyi'j qeju in che kub'san kywitz teya.</t>
6: <pb/><t>Nman, b'intza nna'j Diose, q'ontz twi'ya ti'j nkub'sb'ile twitza.</t>
7: <t>Ok in tzaj yajb'il weye in xi nqanine onb'il teya, porke in chin tzaj ttzaq'we'na.</t>
8: <t>Minti' juntl aju nno'k kydiosin xjal jaku pon ik tza'n teya Nman. Mlay pon kyaq'unb'en txqantl ik tza'n teya taq'unb'en.</t>
9: <pb/><t>Nman Dios, tu'na o che b'ant kykyaqil nasyon, ok che tzajel k'ulul teya ex kjawil kynimsa'n tb'iya.</t>
10: <t>Porke o'kxku aya Dios nim toklena, ex in che b'ant qe b'inchb'en nim kyipumal tu'na.</t>
11: <pb/><t>Nman Dios, yek'untza tb'eya weye tu'ntzun wok lpe'ye ti'j tyola axix tok, ex o'kx tu'n nnimane teya.</t>
12: <t>Nman Dios, kjawil nnimsa'ne tu'n tkyaqil wanmiye ex kukx kjawil nnimsa'ne tb'iya.</t>
13: <t>Ma'xix tk'ujlalila wi'je. Ma chin klete tu'na tu'n mi'n nxi tz'aqe tuj kynajb'il kyimni.</t>
14: <pb/><t>Nman Dios, at jun k'loj xjal in jaw kyniman kyib' ex jawni kywitz tu'n kyq'ojin, minti' kyaj ti'ja, ma jaw kyi'n kyib' wi'je ex kyaj tu'n nkub' kyb'yo'n.</t>
15: <t>Atzun teya Nman Dios, at tk'ujlalila ex at tq'aq'b'il tk'u'ja, at tpasensa, ma'xix ju tk'ujlalila ex axix tok tyola.</t>
16: <t>Chin tke'yintza, q'aq'antz tk'u'ja wi'je. Chin tkloma aqine tmajena. Q'ontza wipune.</t>
17: <t>Q'ontza jun yek'b'il ti'j t-xtalb'ila, tu'ntzun kyjaw ch'ixwi qeju in che ik'unte wi'je ok kyke'yinte jlu. Nman Dios, tu'na in tzaj tq'o'na onb'il weye ex q'uqb'ab'l nk'u'je.</t>
